caption.p: Characteristics of the included studies. Data in the table were arranged as total patients/prevalence (poor outcome group vs. without poor outcome group).

tr.td: 28 days Mean Duration: Not Reported Sample: January 3, 2020 to February 15, 2020 Followed up to: February 15, 2020
100 vs 97.6 Arbidol: 5.9 vs. 37.6 Oseltamivir: 82.4 vs. 61.2 Lopinavir + Ritonavir: 23.5 vs. 28.2
